meta.article_title: November 18, 2019 - "Proper Way" is What Works for You

terminologie_extrait.definition: the tried and true techniques used by top players
terminologie_extrait.contexte: learning to play like the top players

proper-way-what-works-for-you.probleme: older players with bad habits or unconventional playing style

intermediaire: forget much of the 'proper way' and focus on what you're good at

exercices_complementaires.nom: dominating with backhand and blocking game

metriques_progression: learn the rest of your game the 'proper way'
erreurs_a_eviter: mindlessly trying to play like top players
